row.entry: euca2ools crashes when non ascii character is passed (TOOLS-385)

Occurs when the locale settings prevent python from encoding all of the characters in a command's output. One can work around this bug by explicitly setting the LC_CTYPE environment variable to a locale that is capable of handling the characters in use, such as en_US.UTF-8.
